name: Panzer Hearts - War Visual Novel
description: Build the tanks, Date the girls, Choose your side. Live through the adventure and drama of an alternate universe World War 2.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.66 GHZ Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated graphics Storage: 592 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
